metadata.title: CVE-2024-35831 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:io_uring: Fix release of pinned pages when __io_uaddr_map failsLooking at the error path of __io_uaddr_map, if we fail after pinningthe pages for any reasons, ret will be set to -EINVAL and the errorhandler won't properly release the pinned pages.I didn't manage to trigger it without forcing a failure, but it canhappen in real life when memory is heavily fragmented.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
